char_info.char_desc: The Plant Whose Hair Never Stops Growing

t_scene_info.speaker: Mayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Even if you made most of my hair fall out, watch what happens!

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Yeah. I tried to cut it only for it to grow back within seconds.

t_scene_info.speaker: Mayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I'll leave you alone, but good luck trying to find the spell's origin!
